title: Andy Last
text:
Andy Last (born 25 March 1981) is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> coach who is the assistant coach at <a href="Castleford%20Tigers">Castleford Tigers</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Super%20League">Betfred Super League</a>. 
He is a former professional <a href="rugby%20league%20footballer">rugby league footballer</a> who played as a for <a href="Hull%20FC">Hull FC</a> in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a> and was the head coach of <a href="Hull%20FC">Hull</a> in 2020.
